## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6082dd30329215006112f50c3006a58f4437a48913646c4551e68d48e2d768e7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'heft-parameter-plugin' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
